Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the event by suggesting that it is a new initiative of the Shiv Sena government, when it was actually part of a national event organized annually.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the police were distributing Islamic prayer beads under the new Shiv Sena government.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the police action is directly linked to the new government, without considering alternative explanations or motives.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation provided by the senior police officer and the officer distributing prayer beads suggests that the event was part of a national program and not specifically ordered by the state government.
Understate: The claim may understate the significance of the event by not mentioning its annual occurrence as part of the National Integration Week.
